content:
Let´s rephrase this so its fits inside our context statement, use a microsoft tone: "The Cita Previa website is a crucial platform for booking appointments to renew passports and obtain national and foreign IDs. With the COVID-19 pandemic, this system is the primary channel for booking appointments for all residents and citizens of Spain for the mentioned paperwork proceedings. 

The service goal is to provide a digital-first experience that streamlines the process and serves as the main entry point for accessing other services."
